messages: I love you more every day <3
You mean the world to me
I wish I was there with you
I would do anything for you
I hope you miss me like I miss you
You are the prettiest girl in the world
You're the best thing that's ever happened to me
I can't wait to hold you again
Looks like all we got is eachother
We'll be together again soon enough
You are the light of my life
I can't wait for our future
Dream a little dream of me
